text: Alexa Chung was spotted in the JW Anderson FROW alongside other LFW celebrities London Fashion Week began yesterday and today marks one of the most eventful on the style calendar. Celebrities and fashionistas have stepped out to see the new JW Anderson collection. TV personality and model Alexa Chung was spotted in the FROW alongside other high profile attendees. She sported an all black ensemble, comprised of straight - leg leather jeans, a patent sleeved top with collar and patent black shoes to match.
